extDescription.message: Intercept IDE protocol links and open them in your preferred editor. Supports vscode://, cursor://, windsurf://, and more.

menuSelectIde.description: Context menu title for IDE selection

menuInstallVsix.description: Context menu title for VSIX installation

warningNotInstalled.message: No reaction if program is not installed

notificationVsixDownloaded.description: Notification title when VSIX is downloaded

notificationVsixInstallHint.message: Use "$IDE_NAME$ --install-extension <path>" or drag into Extensions view.

notificationInstalledTo.description: Text between extension ID and IDE name in success notification

statusRegistered.description: Tooltip when IDE protocol is registered

statusNotRegistered.description: Tooltip when IDE protocol is not registered

statusChecking.description: Tooltip when checking IDE protocol status

fixRegistration.description: Button text to fix protocol registration

fixFailed.message: Registration failed. Please check if the IDE is installed.
